events.message: We have received the application of Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering, specifically for the software developer role in our core team.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to handle Jane Doe's candidacy and will reach out to schedule the initial screening.
The initial screening call was successfully completed to evaluate Jane's technical background and cultural fit for the engineering team.
Jane responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing strong enthusiasm for the software engineer role.
A technical interview has been scheduled for Jane with the engineering leads next week to further assess her development skills.
